description: Dart source file defining the WishlistScreen widget for a Flutter application. It renders a grid of wishlist books with an AppBar, some spacing, a text displaying the number of items, and a grid of BookCard widgets. It includes navigation to a product page and a mock action for moving items to the cart.

classes.name: WishlistScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a wishlist as a 2-column grid with each item being a BookCard. It shows item count, navigates to product details on tap, and has a move-to-cart action.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product page with the selected book as argument.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the wishlist screen, including app bar, item count, and grid of books.
